companyInfo.name: Chengdu Nixingde Sports Technology Co., Ltd.
companyInfo.nameEn: Chengdu Nixingde Sports Technology Co., Ltd.
companyInfo.nameDescription: What we provide is a "Business Growth Operating System" driven by artificial intelligence. We are not just technology providers, but your "Growth Strategic Partners" fighting side by side. Our mission is to transform the AI growth paradigms validated by the world's top tech companies into core capabilities that any enterprise can deploy and own, achieving predictable, measurable, and sustainable performance multiplication.
companyInfo.slogan: AI+ Business Growth Integrated Solutions, Data-Driven Performance Growth
companyInfo.sloganEn: AI+ Business Growth Integrated Solutions, Data-Driven Performance Growth
companyInfo.focus: Growth Diagnosis · Strategy Generation · Execution Implementation · Effect Iteration · Accompaniment for Results
companyInfo.subtitle: AI+ Business Growth integrated solutions for enterprises across all industries, leveraging cutting-edge artificial intelligence technology and full-chain business data insights to accurately identify business performance growth bottlenecks, providing intelligent services throughout the entire process from growth diagnosis, strategy generation, execution implementation to effect iteration and accompaniment for results.

intro: We are an AI+ Business Growth integrated solution provider for enterprises across all industries, leveraging cutting-edge artificial intelligence technology and full-chain business data insights to accurately identify business performance growth bottlenecks.

Our core value lies in breaking the experience dependency of traditional growth models, making data-driven decisions to help enterprises achieve customer acquisition efficiency improvement, conversion chain optimization, customer value deepening, operational cost reduction, renewal continuation, and ultimately achieve sustainable performance growth goals.

We benchmark against the core logic of the world's top AI business growth service providers. Our system is characterized by 'full data integration, full scenario adaptation, and full-cycle empowerment', covering the full lifecycle growth needs of enterprises from startup to maturity, adapting to multiple industries and scenarios.
aboutUs.mission: Through AI technology and data-driven business growth solutions, help enterprises break the experience dependency of traditional growth models and achieve sustainable performance growth.
aboutUs.vision: To become a world-leading AI business growth service provider, making data-driven decisions to empower enterprises across all industries to achieve sustainable growth.
values: Equal emphasis on data-driven and intelligent decision-making
Equal emphasis on full-scenario adaptation and personalized services
Equal emphasis on strategy generation and execution implementation
Equal emphasis on effect iteration and continuous accompaniment

coreTechStack.title: Core Technology Foundation
coreTechStack.subtitle: The system is built on three core technology pillars to ensure the accuracy and implementation efficiency of growth strategies:

pillars.name: Full-Chain Data Integration Engine
pillars.description: Supports direct integration with enterprise CRM, ERP, e-commerce platforms, marketing tools, user behavior monitoring and other multi-source systems. Through data cleaning, desensitization, and standardization, builds a unified enterprise growth data platform, achieving full-dimensional integration of customer data, transaction data, operational data, and market data, providing high-quality data foundation for AI analysis.

pillars.name: Multi-Dimensional AI Algorithm Engine
pillars.description: Integrates core algorithms such as machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing, and predictive analysis to build a dynamically iterative algorithm model library, covering customer profiling, demand prediction, behavior path analysis, intelligent recommendation, risk identification and other types of algorithm models, adapting to decision-making needs of different growth scenarios.

pillars.name: Real-Time Intelligent Decision System
pillars.description: Based on the output of the data platform and algorithm engine, builds a millisecond-level response decision system that can automatically generate growth strategies and synchronize to various enterprise execution terminals, while monitoring strategy execution effects in real-time, dynamically adjusting parameters to ensure continuous optimization of growth effects.

coreModules.title: Core Functional Modules
coreModules.subtitle: The system is broken down into five core functional modules around the full-chain core links of enterprise performance growth, forming a growth closed loop of "diagnosis-acquisition-conversion-retention-value-added":

modules.name: Growth Diagnosis and Attribution Module
modules.description: Through AI algorithms, deeply analyzes enterprise historical planning, architecture, processes, performance, operations, daily behaviors and other data to accurately identify performance growth bottlenecks. At the same time, builds multi-dimensional attribution models to clarify the contribution of different planning, paths, channels, and strategies to performance, providing overall and detailed optimization support for subsequent growth strategy formulation.

modules.name: Precise Customer Acquisition and Traffic Optimization Module
modules.description: Based on customer profiling, achieves precise positioning and segmentation of target customer groups. Intelligently matches optimal customer acquisition channels (such as social media, search engines, offline scenarios, etc.) and automatically generates personalized marketing content (copywriting, posters, video scripts, etc.). Monitors traffic quality and customer acquisition costs of each channel in real-time, dynamically optimizes channel placement strategies to improve customer acquisition efficiency.

modules.name: Conversion Chain Intelligent Optimization Module
modules.description: For enterprise sales conversion full process (such as consultation-quotation-signing, browsing-cart-payment, etc.), through AI analysis of user behavior paths, identifies key conversion nodes and churn pain points. Automatically optimizes conversion processes (such as simplifying signing processes, optimizing quotation strategies) and provides real-time auxiliary tools such as intelligent customer service and personalized recommendations to improve conversion rates.

modules.name: Customer Retention and Value-Added Module
modules.description: Builds customer lifecycle value (CLV) prediction models for segmented customer operations. Automatically generates personalized retention strategies (such as membership benefits customization, repurchase incentives, exclusive service reminders, etc.). At the same time, mines customer cross-purchase and upselling needs, recommends suitable products/services to enhance customer lifetime value.

modules.name: Growth Risk Intelligent Control Module
modules.description: Monitors various risks in the performance growth process in real-time (such as abnormal fluctuations in customer acquisition costs, soaring customer churn rates, intensified market competition, etc.), provides early warning through AI algorithms and generates risk response strategies to help enterprises avoid growth traps and ensure growth stability.

systemArchitecture.title: Business Growth System Overall Architecture (Global Perspective)
systemArchitecture.subtitle: The whole is a "four-layer integrated system". Each layer does not exist independently, but serves the "growth closed loop".

layers.name: Business Planning and Data Integration Layer (Data Foundation)
layers.description: Transform "all enterprise growth-related data" into AI-understandable language. Integrate and unify CRM/ERP/order systems, market placement data, sales behavior data, customer behavior data, customer service/after-sales/delivery data. Through a unified data semantic layer, achieve customer full lifecycle view, channel real ROI attribution, and sales "behavior × result" causal mapping.

layers.name: Growth Intelligence Engine Layer (AI Core)
layers.description: System brain and moat: Automatically establish "acquisition → conversion → repurchase → churn" causal models, predict and warn future 30/60/90-day revenue, identify high-value customers about to churn and false opportunities. Provide intelligent decision recommendations (which channel to increase, which sales to follow which customers, which customers can raise prices or need to lower prices, etc.).

layers.name: Business Execution System Layer (Execution System)
layers.description: Let AI enter the front line, not just give suggestions, but directly drive execution actions. For sales: automatically generate customer profiles and deal probability, recommend optimal scripts and follow-up rhythm, remind key deal window periods. For marketing: automatically allocate budget to high-ROI channels, eliminate low-efficiency content/creatives in real-time, automatically test, learn and scale. For customer success: predict renewal probability, identify upsell/cross-sell opportunities, proactively intervene in churn risks.

layers.name: Management and Decision Cockpit (Command Center)
layers.description: Upgrade from "listening to reports" to "seeing facts + seeing predictions". Real-time revenue prediction, growth bottleneck positioning, human efficiency/channel efficiency/customer efficiency visible on one screen. All core decisions are supported by AI simulation results, achieving true data-driven management.

serviceSystem.title: Service System: Full-Cycle Empowerment of Enterprise Growth
serviceSystem.subtitle: Learn from the service models of the world's top AI business growth companies, build a full-cycle empowerment system of "product + service + operations" to ensure full implementation of system value:

tracks.name: Standardized Solution Services
tracks.description: Provide standardized AI growth solutions for common growth needs of enterprises in different industries and scales.

items.name: SME "Light Growth Package"
items.description: Focus on core links of customer acquisition and conversion, provide lightweight data integration, basic AI diagnosis, standardized customer acquisition strategies and tools, quickly help enterprises start AI growth mode, achieve performance improvement at low cost.

items.name: Large Enterprise "Full-Domain Growth Package"
items.description: Cover full-chain growth links, provide full-dimensional data integration, customized algorithm models, full-domain growth strategies and corresponding tools, adapt to complex growth needs of enterprises with multiple business lines and regions.

items.name: Industry-Specific Solutions
items.description: For retail, catering, education, manufacturing, internet and other subdivided industries, combine industry characteristics to create exclusive AI growth solutions and tools (such as intelligent product selection and precision marketing for retail industry, student retention and course renewal improvement for education industry, etc.).

tracks.name: Customized Growth Engineering Services
tracks.description: For enterprise personalized and complex growth needs, provide customized growth engineering, tools and workflow setup services.

items.name: Deep Needs Research
items.description: Form a dedicated team, deeply enter enterprise business scenarios, comprehensively sort out business processes, growth pain points, and core goals, form customized needs solutions.

items.name: Exclusive Solution Design
items.description: Based on needs research, customize and develop exclusive AI algorithm models, data integration solutions, and growth strategy systems to ensure deep adaptation of solutions to enterprise business.

items.name: Full-Process Implementation
items.description: Provide full-process services and tools from system deployment, data integration, model training, strategy launch to personnel training to ensure smooth implementation of customized solutions.

tracks.name: Full-Cycle Operations Accompaniment Service - Get Results
tracks.description: To ensure the sustainability of growth effects, provide full-cycle operations accompaniment services, responsible for enterprise revenue growth data.

items.name: Real-Time Data Monitoring
items.description: Build exclusive growth dashboard, display core growth indicators (customer acquisition cost, conversion rate, repurchase rate, performance growth rate, etc.) in real-time, let enterprises clearly grasp growth dynamics.

items.name: Regular Effect Review
items.description: Output growth effect analysis reports monthly/quarterly, summarize strategy effectiveness, identify optimization space, provide iteration suggestions.

items.name: 7×24 Hours Technical Support
items.description: Provide all-day technical services, quickly respond to system failures, data problems and other emergencies to ensure stable system operation.

items.name: Continuous Capability Empowerment
items.description: Regularly conduct AI growth knowledge training and system operation training to help enterprise teams improve data-driven growth capabilities.

deliveryModes.title: Delivery Modes: Adapt to Enterprises at Different Stages
deliveryModes.subtitle: All can provide: Standard Product / Custom Product / Accompaniment for Results Product

modes.name: Growth Cloud SaaS Platform
modes.description: Provide out-of-the-box standardized AI growth toolset for growing enterprises, quick deployment, pay for performance. Suitable for SaaS, chain, platform companies: quick launch, standardized best practices, continuous model evolution.

modes.name: Enterprise Hybrid Deployment
modes.description: Provide hybrid solutions combining cloud AI capabilities with localized data deployment for medium-sized enterprises, balancing capabilities and security. Suitable for large enterprises: clear goals, willing to systematically restructure growth models.

modes.name: Deep Customization and Co-Creation Solutions
modes.description: Form joint project teams with large enterprises or industry leaders, deeply co-create industry-exclusive growth AI models, build strategic moats. We are not just service providers, but growth partners.

serviceForms.name: Enterprise Growth AI System Setup (Project-based)
serviceForms.suitable: Large enterprises, with clear growth goals, willing to systematically restructure growth models
serviceForms.delivery: Growth model setup, private deployment/exclusive training, management decision system

serviceForms.name: AI Growth SaaS Platform (Subscription-based)
serviceForms.suitable: Growing enterprises, SaaS, chain, platform companies
serviceForms.delivery: Quick launch, standardized best practices, continuous model evolution

serviceForms.name: AI Growth Consultant + Co-creation (Deep Cooperation)
serviceForms.suitable: Industry leaders, companies wanting to build "industry's first growth engine"
serviceForms.delivery: Become enterprise's "Growth Partner", define industry growth standards together

scenarios: Enterprises hoping for performance revenue, needing new growth and breakthroughs

Enterprises with low customer retention rates and weak repurchase willingness, needing to enhance customer value

Enterprises facing intensified market competition, needing innovative growth models
